content.detailedDescription: I left my house to walk my dog on 12-30-2017 at 8:25pm walking west, i usually look to the sky's for meteor showers, shooting stars. i saw at about a 45 degree angle on the horizon between myself and south mountain to the west an unusually bright and large red light with two smaller white lights to either side forming a disc shape. i stopped and observed it moving to the east toward me, i decided to call my daughter to see if she could see from her location east of me a few miles (she couldn't) i then observed the object stop and hover in place then start moving south. i attempted to take video but was unable to open video mode only a time lapse photo was taken (will need to review). my dog was getting agitated and whining then the disc went from being large and visible to accelerating to the southwest at such a rate of speed it went to a pinpoint and gone. i'm retired air force and that was not an aircraft from this earth, i have never seen anything like it in my life before, truly amazing. my dog seems to be bit lethargic after getting home and i have a very bad headache, not sure what to make of that as of yet.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighted a disc shaped object with large red light in the center and 2 white lights to either side moving east toward me while walking my dog.

content.detailedDescription: I came outside of my home because i had heard several loud explosions in the neighborhood. these might have been new year's early fireworks but they sounded like gunfire to me. as i was looking around i noticed two red globes in the sky in the general direction of the airport. one of them appeared farther away than the other. neither was moving but remained stationary. i thought they might have been helicopters but i could see no movement at all and they were glowing red all over. more like a subdued fireball. i wanted to get a better view so i ran into the house to get a pair of binoculars. unfortunately, by the time i got the binoculars unpacked and focused the objects had disappeared. so, this whole sighting only lasted a minute or two. i was disappointed that i couldn't see them with my binoculars, but the truth is that i wouldn't have been able to hold the 10x binoculars steady enough to see more detail anyway.
content.summary: Observed 2 stationary red globes in sky above boise in general direction of airport.

content.detailedDescription: This photo was taken by me, in may of 2017 in  michigan, in my back yard...My daughter had heard something in the tall grass, i walked over to see what it was, i saw two brief flashes of light as if from something metallic...It was dusk and the sun was below the horizon at this point. i took out my phone and began taking pictures. i noticed an image above the fire and only adjusted the light exposure on the photo to bring out the image, nothing else has been altered. the small dot of light to the right of the image is a light on a house, several hundred feet away on a neighboring property. we have frequent sightings of ufo's in the sky here, we see them about a third as often as we see aircraft here.
content.summary: This photo was taken by me, in may of 2017 in lupton, mi in my back yard...My daughter had heard something in the tall grass, i walked over to see what it was, i saw two brief flashes of light as if from something metallic...It was dusk and the sun was be

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 7 pm my time. i went outside for a cigarette. i was looking at the moon, when i noticed an explosion in the night sky. no sound. followed by a burning ball that , to my sight , seemed to fall to earth. i have never seen this before and was very exited. i am wondering what it was.
content.summary: Explosion, followed by fire trail falling to beyond sight

content.detailedDescription: Over washington street, hanover, ma. we first seen it when we were driving in car south near shaws market @ 4-4:15-ish. my daughter sydney pointed it out saying "it looks like someone lost a bunch of balloons" then after a half hour later 4;45 we were coming back north near east street and she said it was still there. i pulled into the auto mall across from western auto's we got out and we watched it for about ten minutes. it seemed to be a diamond shape, black and stayed in the same place 500 to 1000 feet above us for 5 minutes and then slowly rose upward to the east till i lost track of it. it was snowing lightly and it wasn't making any sound, so i don't think it was a drone. it did appear to be rotating slowly and we both thought we saw a thin line below it like a string, but if it was balloons it would have drifted away faster and it certainly wouldn't have been in the same area for a half hour.
content.summary: Floating black diamond, two sightings half hour apart

content.detailedDescription:
I've woken up a couple of days ago with a very strange triangular bruise on my inside thigh
upon studying this bruise you can see each point of the triangle and inside a perfect circle
i remember nothing about what happened 
since this has appeared im constantly lethargic and want to sleep
content.summary: Possible abduction

content.detailedDescription:
6:09 am i pull out my phone to change my music while i wait for my carpool in my front yard. 
i notice two bright blue-white lights that i assumed had to be a pair of satellites when they began to move together relative to the other stars and clouds very noticeably.
the pair of lights blink in unison and drift to the north east from the east and from right overhead to about 45 degrees from the horizon, just above the treetops and rooftops.
shortly after a third light comes from the north from a low to a higher angle and meets with the two other lights, and forms a triangle as they pass beyond view over the rooftops
i was fascinated at the time, but now i'v turned to fear as over the last ten days i've had more unrecorded encounters with blue blinking lights, most notably tonight at work and home, i have been seeing a staccato blinking in the sky and then nothing. i shone my iphone's flash in the same pattern and got a response, after that i locked my doors and have been writing this report since.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: I noticed two bright lights moving together north about halfway up the sky from the horizon, before they blinked together and met up with a third blinking light then moved north east and disappeared over the top of the houses.

content.detailedDescription: around 3 am i received a phone call from my 2 youngest daughters both were at there home i was with my oldest daughter at my home approximately 1 mile away. my daughter told me to go outside that something strange was going on with the sky before i could reach the door she called back hesterical telling me the earth was spinning out of controll i laughed ask had she been drinking.So my daughter and   i went out the earth felt as if had fallen off it's axes and was out of controll spinning so fast i thought i was going to fall. half of the sky looked as if it were day time the moon had a huge cloud in front of it lumanating orange yellow so bright it was lighting up the sky when we looked to the other side it was dark and there were thousands of stars all of the sudden the stars started to fly across the sky and line up about this time i dropped to my knees and began to pray my daughter thought it was end times and raced home after about a 100 stars had moved across sky they formed a huge craft and i mean huge and as quick as it was there it was gone the moon when back to normal. a note that my neighbor had came out and was walking to his car  i called out 2 times for him to look up it was as if he didn't hear me i made the comment to my daughters that if we saw what we know we saw the military will release a statement and sure enough the next morning  paper said something stupid i can't recall now but it was laughable i have researched for years trying to find someone with what  i saw can't even come close but myself and 3 daughters saw this. i have painted it on my  bedroom wall so when i told people itwas so hard to explain and easier to show. everyone i have told seems to  believes me i thought they would think i was nuts and there have been times i have had to get my daughters to confirm
content.summary: At least a 100 that first we're thought to be stars until they started moving with half of the sky glowing clound covering moon with orange color enough to light the sky i thought it was the sun

content.detailedDescription: I was walking at sunset near my parents's property (we live in a farm). it had rained heavily during the day and there were many enormous clouds in the sky above. in the southwest direction there was a very small and fuzzy greyish cloud, very far from any other clouds, and much smaller than the rest. i looked at it initially because i thought it looked funny. after a few seconds, it flashed a white light. i kept looking at it, trying to find the source, waiting for it to flash again. i couldn't see any airplanes or anything like that around, just the cloud, and it was moving southward very slowly. someone told me, and i have seen it myself a couple of times, that there is a small airplane that takes pictures of the ground, apparently government owned, but i couldn't see it this time. sometimes airplanes fly nearby as well, but i couldn't see or hear any, either. so i immediately thought it was an ufo, for some reason. the way it was slowly moving made me think that it was something unknown, even though it might as well just be a regular cloud moving because of the wind. and then the light, which i honestly can't understand and would like to. i felt sure that it was an ufo (even though i've never believed those could be seen from earth) and also a bit curious and afraid. i kept looking at it for a while, but could see nothing more, only that it was still moving very slowly southward and that it appeared to have smaller clouds under it, also soaring and moving. as it was getting darker, i went inside, but for some reason the "incident" was still on my mind, so i decided to look the internet about it.
content.summary: Saw a bright white light but couldn't find source

content.detailedDescription: At 8:20 pm we received a text to go outside and look to the nw, strange lights in the sky. the wife and i went outside and sure enough there was 12 to 15 red lights in the sky not too far above the trees.  all lights were at an equal distance from one another.  all were hovering at first then they slowly began moving forward at the same time, in a south sw direction, very slow.  we could hear no engine noise as we were too far away, probably 5 to 7 miles.  the witness that reported it to me said she heard a loud humming coming from them or it.  we were unable to tell if it was one object like the phoenix lights or multiple objects.  whatever it was it was not airplanes.  the lights were a solid color with no flashing or pulsating of different colors.  they did seem to move in unison.
content.summary: 12 to 15 red lights in the sky in the nw

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on deck watching the sky
2. thought we were watching a satellite but it stopped and grew in size/intensity
3. a satellite
4. traveling west across the southern sky. small pinpoint of light moving about like a satellite would but it stopped and then grew either in size or intensity or both. grew to the size of a small aspirin. stayed that way for about 10 seconds. it then shrunk back to the pinpoint of light and resumed it's course.
5. felt really strange about it ... a little freaked out
6. it eventually traveled beyond what we could see
content.summary: Saw tiny spot then grew to aspirin size for a few secs then got small and resumed path

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were walking out to check on some trees, when all of a a sudden when we were near the first tree, a bright, small (around the size of a basketball) yellow-white glowing orb/circle flew out above and past a shop, flew right by us, then once it hit the treetops it disintegrated/disappeared. we looked around but could not find any remains of the object. what really got us was how it just disappeared once it hit the treetops, just like poof, gone. we investigated and tried to reason out what we saw, trying to make an excuse for what the object was, but no excuse fits what happened, so we figured that, well, it might have been and probably was,a ufo.
content.summary: Small glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were in my apartment backyard just talking about getting firewood for the grill and he pointed to something in the western sky a triangle shaped like plane, i thought until it was over head and approx one mile up it was a big triangle shaped craft and hovering then it was moving to the east but seeming to be stopping and hovering, but? that's awesome! that's the first time for me to see a triangle shaped craft, seen plenty of other stuff in my 60+ years ;)
content.summary: Triangle shaped in appearance when it was directly over head and approx 1 mile straight up, it appeared to change shape as it progressively moved east and also hovering in it's forward motion.

content.detailedDescription:
Can anyone make out or guess at what the bright light is at coordinates

37.1634451, -115.7760900

on google maps?

it's just south of the area 51 base.

thanks.
content.summary: Observing possible anomaly on google map

content.detailedDescription: Went out at approx. 2230 hrs to look at stars after couple minutes one of the stars started moving very slow n to nw,observed a commercial jet heading w to e normal flight path shortly after, thinking it was military or satellite continued watching until light just went out.  continued looking at area where like went out, had been a couple minutes,then there was a transparent like streak from where light had gone out moving much faster,like missile launch from a fighter jet,but streak was short lived,sort of like a meteor but transparent dull looking and moving slower, the only thing that gets me is the streak came from same place light went out and it was couple minutes later the streak and it appeared to be very high,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed star like or satellite looking start to move slowl nw ,compared with pass jet going w to e, light went out,kept watching for about 1-2 minutes area where  all of a sudden there was a streak sorta transparent,missile like but didnt last no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a bonfire in the fens one dark cold evening in october 2000 when i noticed i could see some green lights strobing back and forth in the clear night sky and didn’t think anything of it as thought it was a light being projected from the ground by somebody but couldn’t see any beams of light shining up from the ground plus there was no cloud cover so nothing for the light to reflect off. 
theses lights strobed for two hours in the same place before they both moved directly above my position where one cylinder split itself into lots of smaller lights and created a sphere like shape and was oscillating like a planet and the other green cylinder turned into a 3 dimensional triangle where they both oscillated together for only about 10 seconds before they returned to their original position and carried on stobing again. 
as it was so cold outside me and my brother went in for a hot drink before returning and noticed the lights had moved about a mile away and were strobing again. 
by this time it was around 11:50pm and as i watched them strobing one shot diagonally from its strobing position about 300miles to the top right corner and the other cylinder carried on strobing then  that joined the hovering green cylinder and the sky turned white with a flash and they were gone. 
i will never forget that sighting i believe either they were ufo from another world or human made top secret spacecraft.
content.summary: Strobed in a straight line left to right

content.detailedDescription: I don't remember the date so above is incorrect. i just wanted to report because heard of something similar on a pod cast. in late 1992 or early 1993 i came home from college around noon. i went inside picked up my sister then remembered i needed something from my car. i put my sister on the car hood got my bag then looked above my house and saw a white glowing egg shaped object flying by. it looked like it was giving off light, i thought to myself that it looked like a white glow stick (at this time there were only green glow sticks so it stuck in my mind). it flew over the house at a slow speed i would guess 30mph in a south to north direction. it was higher than the power lines by about 50ft. i thought "what the heck was that!", i looked around to see if anyone was outside because it was mid day. there was no one out. before it got out of site it stopped and returned hovered descended to the height of a power pole above my house. it hovered for probably less than a minute, turned hovered then a helicopter appeared from the south above it. the helicopter felt like it just appeared but after noting it i noticed it was not as loud as i have heard others to be. it was black. the object turned from having the small end toward me pointed west to pointing north again. then it flew north came back and hovered next to the helicopter. the objects size was the same as the helicopter side by side not including the blades. the sliding door on the helicopter opened and i could see one person inside. while this was happening i started to yell for my father and anyone inside the house to come outside. while looking at this display i thought to myself that whomever came up with the ship in the movie "the navigator" really got the color wrong but got the shape of the ship almost right, then i thought that the one in the movie changed shape before it took off. as i thought that, the object changed shape becoming more triangular and speed off north. the helicopter began to follow it and two other helicopters where a few seconds behind the original one then 4 others, black also. at this time my older sister finally came outside i told her what i saw. i don't think she believed me but then a formation of about 8 black helicopters flew over heading in the same direction. my thought about that is where the heck do they keep these helicopters and how could i be the only person who saw this thing. anaheim is a busy city and i lived very close to disneyland. i just thought if anyone else saw this thing my siting could support them.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Egg shape glowing white passed above house then returned hovered next to helicopter changed shape shot off

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i drove my car to the dumpster at my office to unload construction debris. 
i was watching the moon as the clouds passed over because it had a rainbow halo around it from the rain clouds passing over it, while my son was unlocking the dumpster.
at first i thought i was seeing stars peaking through as the clouds would push by and there was a break in them. 
i quickly realized the lights were in motion, and they had two distinct patterns v or w depending on how large that cluster was, and we're moving fast from the norh end over my building to the south towards our downtown area.  they covered the area of my building, parking lot, the main 5 lane street and over the buildings across the street. the first wave was so fast there were so many and they just kept coming from every angle i looked. i told my son to look up there were ufo's so he could see them passing over also. 
i started yelling for him to hurry up and call his dad to come outside my office and watch the sky. 
my husband walked half the length of the building after we called him and they were still coming in clusters but a little more spread out then the first group i initially observed. 
they're were no colored lights or blinking lights of any kind that i observed just straight golden white lights like a bright star glowing. 
it was quite incredible to witness for all of us myself, my husband, and my son.
content.summary: Observed over 100 orbs of light in v like repeating patterns fly overhead for 8-10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving lyft as i was having at the time. when my intuition told me to look up, at that same exact time that i look up i see a orb pulsating different colors move fast and shoot off into the west. in seconds it was gone into the darkness. i was excited to see another ufo. this is the third time that i’m witnessing an orb of light in the sky that i can’t explain. there were other helicopters in the air at the same time. in la it’s hard to see a star in the sky now imagen how rare its to see a shooting star.
content.summary: Fast movng orb of light

content.detailedDescription: Huge boomerang or triangle shape ufo, it was a summer night, i was in the pool looking to the skies, i saw it and tried to call my cousin to come with the camera, he didn't listen to me, i kept watching it till i had no sight anymore. it was flying over my grandma's house, sw direction, much slower and bigger than any airplane i've seen. only after a few seconds i noticed that there was very little lights under that thing. i was scared, and didn't mention that to anyone till 10 years after when i left my religiosity.
content.summary: Boomerang or triangle shape ufo in brazil 2001
content.locationName: Novo Hamburgo, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my balcony and a bright light caught my eye. thinking it was a planet i grabbed my telescope and what did i see... a set of multi-colored lights spinning in the same direction. the object appeared to have many layers or circles to it. the two outer most had the multi-colored lights and then there were 5-6 grey circles moving towards a dark grey dot in the center. it is still up there as i write. 

i then saw another one but it had a solid goldish color light pattern only and as soon as i put the telescope on it, the object moved and quickly vanished while the original remains in the sky.
content.summary: 2 circles of spinning multi-colored lights seen through a telescope with video of lights in motion.

content.detailedDescription: My brother filmed this ufo 12-17 in detroit michigan at night at our uncles home, no airports nearby. the ufo was yellowish in the center,  circling around was yellowish in various colors moving like a jelly fish, but as he filmed this thing the circular ufo appeared white, and that field around the object broke up in box form as static, but its plain to see. it also made a right angle turn, then left before disappearing others witnessed it. i contacted local news fox2 here, no reply, how can i get you this footage.
content.summary: How do i get you the footage

content.detailedDescription: 1 mile west of blue springs nebraska on highway 77 i noticed a large aircraft traveling below 300 feet very slowly no sound only seeing some yellow lights it was a little foggy out and then it disappeared.  i am an army aviation veteran who has worked around aircraft for a long time and this was like nothing i’ve ever seen before.
content.summary: Traveling south below 300 feet, larger than a cessna quite in the fog. military veteran. worked in army aviation .

content.detailedDescription: Dark very dark
content.summary: Small features 5th white black eyes very black eyes

content.detailedDescription:
1. one hour before sunset, my back porch.
2. watching the light change on the mts.
3. looked like a very bright star, but no other stars for an hour.
4. looked like a white led with a very light blue hue. i watched it for 
  about 10 min then it changed size, got a little bigger. 
5.Tried to film with a phone, didn't work, viewed totally for 15 min with 
  good binos. 
6. very bright ball, dropped small orbs, (30 to 40). 
7. floated down very slowly, watched for 5 mim. 
8. the mother ship got smaller and disappeared.
9. as the orbs floated down one orb moved around there orbes, like it was 
   arranging them.
10. all the small orbs faded away at one time.

this is where it gets weard 

11. there was a thick layer of pollution over tuscon, it dissipated in 
     the next hour after the even?


12. reaction, i knew i had seen this before on you tube, happened over 
     long beach ca. several vids on it. same thing happened here over 
      tuscon today
content.summary: Mother ship releasing orbs,

content.detailedDescription: 30 years ago i was taken to a ship in outer space. i was shown where they came from and our position compared to them. and much much more. i was told they had to bring me back before to much time passed, i asked why and they said it had to do with c time. didn't find out what they were talking about till now. our time here on earth is different from the amount of time that passes in space, i looked it all up. they knew what they were talking about. they didn't want for me to be to far out of my own time. they cared about that.
content.summary: Covered the sky. all black

content.detailedDescription: last friday (dec 22, 2017), i was in a hobart to sydney flight (8:15 pm - virgin australia), took some pics between 8:30 to 9:00 pm, which showed some unusual objects. not sure if they are #ufo, but its very odd to see these objects as i was nearly in the last flight from hobart and they don't seems to be airplane or helicopter...
content.summary: Ufo sight during hobart to sydney flight

content.detailedDescription: Main object flashing 3 to 4 light patterns then an object would either come out to around the lights and would stay out until lights turned blue or green or object would just come out hover and go back into main lights and a secondary light source would come out from other side and go back in if a plane would get near lights would merge and get dim and after the plane was clean or far away the lights would get bright again and resume what i was doing
content.summary: Main object flashing lights secondary lights either orbiting or staying out and going back in to main light

content.detailedDescription: At around 1 to 130 pm eastern time i was on the highway from perry county to lancaster in my car driving with my girlfriend we have to pass through harrisburg area to get there. on the way through on the highway not far from tmi we saw shiny cylinder directly overhead and in front of us as we drove down the highway it was in a position perpendicular to the ground it's poles one pointing at the sky and one towards the ground but at about a 45 degree slant. we immediately noticed it was moving oddly fast and not in the direction it appeared to be headed or pointed it was going straight ahead of us down the highway on a clear bright blue day here. then within a blink of an eye it shot off ahead and disappeared in half a second and was gone. i followed it with my eyes or tried to it's the type of day you can see forever. it got tinier and tinier and was gone like it just shot up into space or the upper atmosphere directly away from our position on the ground i could tell it had just went a humongous distance but all within not even a second and was gone.
content.summary: Shiny cylinder shot off in front of us on the highway

content.detailedDescription: I lived in seattle, not far from the sound, in a somewhat quiet suburban neighborhood, the ballard area. this was a few years ago, i was probably eleven or twelve at the time. i was playing with a few of the neighbor kids and my little brother outside. it was a warm sunny day, at some point during summer break. we were playing chase when suddenly all of us got scared, i'm not sure why. there was a whirring sound, kind of like wind. a faint shadow was cast over the yard, but i didn't see anything that seemed to be casting a shadow. we started to run, but my brother fell behind us. an invisible force suddenly pulled him across the ground 5-10 feet backwards before it left him. i don't know for sure, but i think this may have been an unsuccessful attempt to abduct my brother.
content.summary: Potential abduction of my brother, unsuccessful. was dragged 5-10 feet back by unknown invisible force
